unnormalised: Campus hiring remains a critical talent acquisition strategy for organizations in India. It provides access to fresh perspectives and skilled individuals directly from esteemed institutions like IIT Delhi. Companies must invest in strong employer branding, similar to promoting a blockbuster Bollywood film, to attract top talent. A well-structured recruitment process, with competitive packages (say Rs. 10 LPA onwards), ensures a positive candidate experience. Consider early engagement programs and pre-placement talks to build relationships.
